newsitem.title: GREECE: PROBLEM AT ATHENS BOURSE DELAYS DATA TRANSMISSION.
newsitem.headline: PROBLEM AT ATHENS BOURSE DELAYS DATA TRANSMISSION.

text.p: Transmission problems at the Athens stock exchange are causing delays of price and other data, a bourse official told Reuters.

"There is a transmission problem affecting vendors and we are working on it," the official said. "We are not sure about the root of the problem but it has nothing to do with the trading engine." --Dimitris Kontogiannis, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
